name: Purple Destroyer
description:
Game Play

Red and blue enemies spawn throughout the map. Kill enemies and protect the four towers. After the towers are destroyed, the enemies target you.

Touching enemies inst recommended. Watch out for invisible enemies by switching your sight (Shift) very often. 

Helpful ramps and walls will also spawn. Ramps and walls will be destroyed if bumped into by enemies.

Controls 

Shift - Switch Sight (You can only see one type of enemy at a time)

WASD - Movement

Space - Jump

Right Click - Shoot

Left Click - Scope

Scroll/Numbers - Switch weapon 

R - Reload
